original_text: While David was at Horesh in the Desert of Ziph, he learned that Saul had come out to take his life.
korean_text: 다윗이 사울이 자기의 생명을 빼앗으려고 나온 것을 보았으므로 그가 십 광야 수풀에 있었더니

sentences.original_text: While David was at Horesh in the Desert of Ziph
sentences.korean_translation: 다윗이 십 광야의 호레스에 있을 때

sentences.original_text: he learned that Saul had come out
sentences.korean_translation: 그는 사울이 나왔다는 것을 알게 되었고
